text:
Wing k chaapu launde se, pure iitk ka chaapu launda. Wing ke only dramatist/actor se best actor award. Bhai tu sabke liye motivation h. Teri achievements, teri hardwork ka correct parameter nahi h. Hope someday that happens.

Aise hi chaapte raho.
author: Abhijeet

text:
Memoirs suck...
So, i am not gonna write one for u
author: Abhijeet

text:
On second thoughts,
Yo Chaapu roomie!
Kya kya likhu. 
Chal first year se shuru karta hu. Sabse pehle to day 1 ko hi tere parents ne life goals puchh ke what laga di. IIT to pahoch gaye aage ka socha hi nahi. Mujhe day 1 se hi lag gaya tha tu typical city ka chasme wala maggu launda hoga. I mean bahot jyada competitive. But on the contrary, tu bahot cool nikla aur acads me bhi help kari. Mth102 me tune 2 din padh k jo chaapa tha bro. Waise stunners tu hi pull off kar sakta h. GTA ke experiences to abhi tak fresh h. Tarish to khelta khelta so jaata tha chair pe. First sem to canteen saath hi jaate the warna nahi jaate the. 

Abhi apni bonding itni ho chuki thi ki second year me saath room lena hi tha. Fir yaha tujhe bahut jyaada "absent roomie" wala time mila hoga, kyuki mai tab athletics ko leke serious ho gaya tha. Fir tere saath kabhi kabhi RM bhi jaana shuru kar dia. Meanwhile, tera PoGo, PUBG, GTA... chalta hi rehta tha. I could not be a partner in all that and you know the reason. 

Aur ha hum kabhi lade nahi, kabhi ek dusre ki complaint bhi nahi ki. Aisa lagta h hmari coordinations perfect baith gayi thi. I could not hope for a better roomie.

Tune kaafi urge bhi kiya second year me kaafi saare cheezo k liye kyunki mai ignorant tha(waise ab bhi hu). But above all this, sabse remarking aur shocking mere liye wo experience tha jo Abhinav ne bataya. Image hi change ho gayi teri. 

Itne sab k baad bhi tu acads me chaapta rha. I don't know this, but your kind is very very rare. Tu sab maje bhi karta h, phir acads me bhi chaap deta h. In sabke baad tu helpful bhi h. Bas tune duniya ke jhamele kam dekhe, shayad isiliye tu easily kisi pe bhi trust kar leta h(this list is endless).

Third year me wing partition wali cheez ko leke Das ab tak gussa h. Promise kiya tha uski wing me rahunga. Phir tu aur Abhinav idhar the to idhar chala aaya.

Baaki Antaragni ya kisi bhi DJ night me saath me maje nahi kar paaye hum, but as of now you must have known that I don't enjoy them very much.

Last moments wo to lifetime yaad rahengi. Campus aae hi the wahi karne.

Aise hi chaapta reh.

Btw Mio Cornetto khaenge aur saath me khaaenge.
author: Abhijeet

text:
The most jugadu person I know. The go to man if assignment nahi kar paaye.

Aur PUBG/Valo/GTA khelna kam kar de
